data.title: Assurant Helps you Take Care of Business
data.meta_description: We help our global clients protect and support the major purchases consumers make — like homes, cars, appliances, and phones — in new and thoughtful ways.
data.text:
CONNECTED LIVING

We specialize in delivering extended protection programs and support services that strengthen customer loyalty, deliver a memorable experience and generate sustainable profit.
